parts.text: Any computer running Mac OS X

lines.text: First, you need to open the terminal window. Click the search icon in the top right of your screen (shown as a magnifying glass), enter <tt>terminal</tt> and click on the only result in the "Applications" section. It should open Terminal.
lines.text_raw: First, you need to open the terminal window. Click the search icon in the top right of your screen (shown as a magnifying glass), enter ``terminal`` and click on the only result in the "Applications" section. It should open Terminal.

lines.text: Once Terminal is open, enter this text: <tt>say hello world</tt>. Then press Enter. The computer should say "hello world"! If you want to make it say something else, type <tt>say</tt> and then what you want to hear!
lines.text_raw: Once Terminal is open, enter this text: ``say hello world``. Then press Enter. The computer should say "hello world"! If you want to make it say something else, type ``say`` and then what you want to hear!

lines.text: Another fun thing to enter in Terminal makes your desktop become a screensaver. Enter this text to do so: <tt>/System/Library/Frameworks/Scr<wbr />eenSaver.framework/Resources/S<wbr />creenSaverEngine.app/Contents/<wbr />MacOS/ScreenSaverEngine -background</tt>
lines.text_raw: Another fun thing to enter in Terminal makes your desktop become a screensaver. Enter this text to do so: ``/System/Library/Frameworks/ScreenSaver.framework/Resources/ScreenSaverEngine.app/Contents/MacOS/ScreenSaverEngine -background``

lines.text: To change your desktop back to normal, close the Terminal window.
lines.text_raw: To change your desktop back to normal, close the Terminal window.

lines.text: One of the most amazing hacks plays an entire Star Wars movie in the terminal window: <tt>telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl</tt>
lines.text_raw: One of the most amazing hacks plays an entire Star Wars movie in the terminal window: ``telnet towel.blinkenlights.nl``

lines.text: Make sure not to resize the window!
lines.text_raw: Make sure not to resize the window!

lines.text: That's all the Terminal hacks I have! I hope you liked them!
lines.text_raw: That's all the Terminal hacks I have! I hope you liked them!

guide.summary: In this guide, you will learn fun terminal hacks for when you get bored!
